basics.summary: An aspiring electrical engineer with interests in power systems, renewable energy, and machine learning applications in power systems.

work.name: EKbana Solutions Pvt. Ltd.

Use of multiple agents for improving large language model (LLM) capability.

courses: Thesis: Development of New Control Strategy in Transformerless Grid Connected PV Inverter to Reduce Leakage Current

Electrical Courseworks: Electric Circuit Theory, Electromagnetics, Electronic devices and circuits, Electric Engineering Material, Advance Power System Analysis, Electrical Machine Design, Control System, Signal Analysis, Switchgear and Protection, Industrial Distribution and Illumination, Power Plant Design, Power Electronics, Transmission and Distribution Design
